18#include "WhiteRectDetector.h"
19#include "BitMatrix.h"
20#include "ZXNumeric.h"
21#include "ResultPoint.h"
22
23namespace ZXing {
24
25static const int INIT_SIZE = 10;
26static const int CORR = 1;
27
28bool WhiteRectDetector::Detect(const BitMatrix& image, ResultPoint& p0, ResultPoint& p1, ResultPoint& p2, ResultPoint& p3)
29{
30 return Detect(image, INIT_SIZE, image.width() / 2, image.height() / 2, p0, p1, p2, p3);
31}
32
33/**
34* Determines whether a segment contains a black point
35*
36* @param a min value of the scanned coordinate
37* @param b max value of the scanned coordinate
38* @param fixed value of fixed coordinate
39* @param horizontal set to true if scan must be horizontal, false if vertical
40* @return true if a black point has been found, else false.
41*/
42static bool ContainsBlackPoint(const BitMatrix& image, int a, int b, int fixed, bool horizontal) {
43
44 if (horizontal) {
45 for (int x = a; x <= b; x++) {
46 if (image.get(x, fixed)) {
47 return true;
48 }
49 }
50 }
51 else {
52 for (int y = a; y <= b; y++) {
53 if (image.get(fixed, y)) {
54 return true;
55 }
56 }
57 }
58
59 return false;
60}
61
62static bool GetBlackPointOnSegment(const BitMatrix& image, int aX, int aY, int bX, int bY, ResultPoint& result) {
63 int dist = RoundToNearest(ResultPoint::Distance(aX, aY, bX, bY));
64 float xStep = static_cast<float>(bX - aX) / dist;
65 float yStep = static_cast<float>(bY - aY) / dist;
66
67 for (int i = 0; i < dist; i++) {
68 int x = RoundToNearest(aX + i * xStep);
69 int y = RoundToNearest(aY + i * yStep);
70 if (image.get(x, y)) {
71 result.set(static_cast<float>(x), static_cast<float>(y));
72 return true;
73 }
74 }
75 return false;
76}
77
78/**
79* recenters the points of a constant distance towards the center
80*
81* @param y bottom most point
82* @param z left most point
83* @param x right most point
84* @param t top most point
85* @return {@link ResultPoint}[] describing the corners of the rectangular
86* region. The first and last points are opposed on the diagonal, as
87* are the second and third. The first point will be the topmost
88* point and the last, the bottommost. The second point will be
89* leftmost and the third, the rightmost
90*/
91static void CenterEdges(const ResultPoint& y, const ResultPoint& z, const ResultPoint& x, const ResultPoint& t, int width, ResultPoint& p0, ResultPoint& p1, ResultPoint& p2, ResultPoint& p3)
92{
93 //
94 // t t
95 // z x
96 // x OR z
97 // y y
98 //
99
100 float yi = y.x();
101 float yj = y.y();
102 float zi = z.x();
103 float zj = z.y();
104 float xi = x.x();
105 float xj = x.y();
106 float ti = t.x();
107 float tj = t.y();
108
109 if (yi < width / 2.0f) {
110 p0 = ResultPoint(ti - CORR, tj + CORR);
111 p1 = ResultPoint(zi + CORR, zj + CORR);
112 p2 = ResultPoint(xi - CORR, xj - CORR);
113 p3 = ResultPoint(yi + CORR, yj - CORR);
114 }
115 else {
116 p0 = ResultPoint(ti + CORR, tj + CORR);
117 p1 = ResultPoint(zi + CORR, zj - CORR);
118 p2 = ResultPoint(xi - CORR, xj + CORR);
119 p3 = ResultPoint(yi - CORR, yj - CORR);
120 }
121}
122
123/**
124* <p>
125* Detects a candidate barcode-like rectangular region within an image. It
126* starts around the center of the image, increases the size of the candidate
127* region until it finds a white rectangular region.
128* </p>
129*
130* @return {@link ResultPoint}[] describing the corners of the rectangular
131* region. The first and last points are opposed on the diagonal, as
132* are the second and third. The first point will be the topmost
133* point and the last, the bottommost. The second point will be
134* leftmost and the third, the rightmost
135* @throws NotFoundException if no Data Matrix Code can be found
136*/
137bool WhiteRectDetector::Detect(const BitMatrix& image, int initSize, int x, int y, ResultPoint& p0, ResultPoint& p1, ResultPoint& p2, ResultPoint& p3)
138{
139 int height = image.height();
140 int width = image.width();
141 int halfsize = initSize / 2;
142 int left = x - halfsize;
143 int right = x + halfsize;
144 int up = y - halfsize;
145 int down = y + halfsize;
146 if (up < 0 || left < 0 || down >= height || right >= width) {
147 return false;
148 }
149
150 bool sizeExceeded = false;
151 bool aBlackPointFoundOnBorder = true;
152 bool atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnBorder = false;
153
154 bool atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnRight = false;
155 bool atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnBottom = false;
156 bool atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnLeft = false;
157 bool atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnTop = false;
158
159 while (aBlackPointFoundOnBorder) {
160
161 aBlackPointFoundOnBorder = false;
162
163 // .....
164 // . |
165 // .....
166 bool rightBorderNotWhite = true;
167 while ((rightBorderNotWhite || !atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnRight) && right < width) {
168 rightBorderNotWhite = ContainsBlackPoint(image, up, down, right, false);
169 if (rightBorderNotWhite) {
170 right++;
171 aBlackPointFoundOnBorder = true;
172 atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnRight = true;
173 }
174 else if (!atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnRight) {
175 right++;
176 }
177 }
178
179 if (right >= width) {
180 sizeExceeded = true;
181 break;
182 }
183
184 // .....
185 // . .
186 // .___.
187 bool bottomBorderNotWhite = true;
188 while ((bottomBorderNotWhite || !atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnBottom) && down < height) {
189 bottomBorderNotWhite = ContainsBlackPoint(image, left, right, down, true);
190 if (bottomBorderNotWhite) {
191 down++;
192 aBlackPointFoundOnBorder = true;
193 atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnBottom = true;
194 }
195 else if (!atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnBottom) {
196 down++;
197 }
198 }
199
200 if (down >= height) {
201 sizeExceeded = true;
202 break;
203 }
204
205 // .....
206 // | .
207 // .....
208 bool leftBorderNotWhite = true;
209 while ((leftBorderNotWhite || !atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnLeft) && left >= 0) {
210 leftBorderNotWhite = ContainsBlackPoint(image, up, down, left, false);
211 if (leftBorderNotWhite) {
212 left--;
213 aBlackPointFoundOnBorder = true;
214 atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnLeft = true;
215 }
216 else if (!atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnLeft) {
217 left--;
218 }
219 }
220
221 if (left < 0) {
222 sizeExceeded = true;
223 break;
224 }
225
226 // .___.
227 // . .
228 // .....
229 bool topBorderNotWhite = true;
230 while ((topBorderNotWhite || !atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnTop) && up >= 0) {
231 topBorderNotWhite = ContainsBlackPoint(image, left, right, up, true);
232 if (topBorderNotWhite) {
233 up--;
234 aBlackPointFoundOnBorder = true;
235 atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnTop = true;
236 }
237 else if (!atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnTop) {
238 up--;
239 }
240 }
241
242 if (up < 0) {
243 sizeExceeded = true;
244 break;
245 }
246
247 if (aBlackPointFoundOnBorder) {
248 atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnBorder = true;
249 }
250
251 }
252
253 if (!sizeExceeded && atLeastOneBlackPointFoundOnBorder) {
254
255 int maxSize = right - left;
256
257 ResultPoint z;
258 bool found = false;
259 for (int i = 1; !found && i < maxSize; i++) {
260 found = GetBlackPointOnSegment(image, left, down - i, left + i, down, z);
261 }
262
263 if (!found) {
264 return false;
265 }
266
267 ResultPoint t;
268 found = false;
269 //go down right
270 for (int i = 1; !found && i < maxSize; i++) {
271 found = GetBlackPointOnSegment(image, left, up + i, left + i, up, t);
272 }
273
274 if (!found) {
275 return false;
276 }
277
278 ResultPoint x;
279 found = false;
280 //go down left
281 for (int i = 1; !found && i < maxSize; i++) {
282 found = GetBlackPointOnSegment(image, right, up + i, right - i, up, x);
283 }
284
285 if (!found) {
286 return false;
287 }
288
289 ResultPoint y;
290 found = false;
291 //go up left
292 for (int i = 1; !found && i < maxSize; i++) {
293 found = GetBlackPointOnSegment(image, right, down - i, right - i, down, y);
294 }
295
296 if (!found) {
297 return false;
298 }
299
300 CenterEdges(y, z, x, t, width, p0, p1, p2, p3);
301 return true;
302 }
303 else {
304 return false;
305 }
306}
307
308} // ZXing
